contents.name: theme-colors
contents.title: Theme colors
contents.description: Defines theme main colors

contents.name: theme-primary-background-color
contents.title: Theme primary background color
contents.description: This theme variable sets the primary background color of the application. For apps on Android devices, it also sets the color of the navigation bar and status bar. Visit "Android Bars in Material Design" (https://m2.material.io/design/platform-guidance/android-bars.html#status) to learn about the navigation and status bars on Android devices.

contents.title: Theme field height ratio
contents.description: Ratio applied to the space around text in a field (top and bottom).

contents.name: theme-field-default-height
contents.title: Theme field default height
contents.description: Field default height

contents.name: theme-font-size-ratio
contents.title: Theme font-size ratio
contents.description: The font size adjustment ratio in relation to Droid Sans font family sizes. For example, if the browser's available font for the <body> element is Times (12px), size of letters are adjusted by multiplying theme-font-size-ratio by font size. In our example, they display at 10.8 pixels high, (0.9 Ã— 12).

contents.name: theme-margin-ratio
contents.title: Theme margin ratio
contents.description: Ratio applied to the margin or space on the left of a field. When you type text in a field you have some space before text that is defined by this variable.

contents.name: theme-density-scale
contents.title: Theme density scale
contents.description: Density to multiply by density interval to create a more or less compact theme. The higher the number, the less dense is the theme

contents.name: theme-font-family-monospace
contents.title: Theme font family monospace
contents.description: Set the monospace font family

contents.name: theme-animation-duration
contents.description: Animation duration (in seconds), such as the speed of Product identication window pop-down appearance.

contents.name: theme-disable-ending-popup
contents.description: Deactivates the pop-up warning displayed on leaving an application. The pop-up warning will be shown if at least one interaction/change has occurred on the application. In development mode on httpdispatch or using the debugMode=1 query string, the popup is never shown.

contents.name: theme-disable-context-menu
contents.title: Disable context menu
contents.description: Disable the genero context menu

contents.name: theme-scrollers-clickonly
contents.description: Define general scrollers behavior

contents.name: theme-scrollers-speed
contents.description: Define the scrollers speed

contents.name: theme-message-display-time
contents.description:
Specify the number of seconds to display the message pane
  • A positive value is the number of seconds to display the pane before fade-out.
  • Set to zero (0) to always show the pane.
  • Set to a negative value to always hide the pane.

contents.name: theme-message-display-position
contents.description:
Position of the message panel. Valid values are:
  • top-left
  • top-center
  • top-right
  • bottom-left
  • bottom-center
  • bottom-right (default)
If the error and message positions are defined for the same place, the two panels will stack.

contents.name: theme-error-display-time
contents.description:
Specify the number of seconds to display the error message pane
  • A positive value is the number of seconds to display the pane before fade-out.
  • Set to zero (0) to always show the pane.
  • Set to a negative value to always hide the pane.

contents.name: theme-error-display-position
contents.description:
Position of the error panel. Valid values are:
  • top-left
  • top-center
  • top-right
  • bottom-left
  • bottom-center
  • bottom-right (default)
If the error and message positions are defined for the same place, the two panels will stack.

contents.name: theme-collapser-position
contents.description: Define the default collapser position (left or right)

contents.name: aui-mutation-watch
contents.title: Gbc Watch aui mutations
contents.description: Enable watching aui mutations

contents.name: aui-mobileUI-default
contents.title: Define if 'mobileUI' flag is sent to DVM
contents.description: Set mobile AUI as default

contents.name: aui-json-protocol
contents.title: JSON Aui protocol
contents.description: Use JSON Aui protocol to avoid parsing

contents.name: theme-action-name-backward-compatibility
contents.title: Compatibility for action name behavior of GBC under 4.01
contents.description: Fallback on action name (for Topmenu, Toolbar and ContextMenu) if there is no text or icon defined for the action

contents.name: theme-table-default-widget
contents.title: Gbc table default widget
contents.description: Gbc default widget used to render table (if value is 'listview' table will be rendered as listview by default else it will be rendered as normal table). Behavior can still be override by 4ST (tableType).

contents.name: theme-default-reduceFilter
contents.title: Define if 'reduceFilter' is set by default for Tables and ScrollGrids
contents.description: Force using reduce Filter if not define as a 4ST style

contents.name: theme-webkit-scrollbars-global-enable
contents.title: Theme webkit scrollbars enabled for all gbc
contents.description: Use webkit rendering for scrollbars (check <xref href="https://caniuse.com/?search=webkit-scrollbar" format="html" scope="external">https://caniuse.com/?search=webkit-scrollbar</xref> for browser compatibility)

contents.name: theme-webkit-scrollbars-size
contents.title: Theme webkit scrollbars size
contents.description: Define webkit scrollbars size

contents.name: theme-table-minimal-row-height
contents.title: Theme minimal table row height
contents.description: Define the minimal table row height in pixels

contents.name: theme-table-minimal-row-height-on-touchscreen
contents.title: Theme minimal table row height
contents.description: Define the minimal table row height in pixels only for mobile

name: features
title: Features
description: Defines theme variables for GBC features, such as fonts, HTML defaults, swipe navigation style, responsive layout, and z-indexes.

name: material
title: Material variables
description: Defines theme variables that apply to a specific component.

name: widgets
title: Widgets specific variables
description: Configure variables specific to a widget.

name: constants
title: Constant variables
description: Constants variables that can be used but not modified.

name: deprecated
title: Deprecated variables
description: Deprecated variables that will be removed.
